CustomField.description:
Formula that uses the current status of the related Account within the Committed business line.
Disqualified: DQ reason is not null Active Customer: # of Committed BUs > 0 Former Customer: # of Won Committed Opportunities > 0 Prospect: # of Opportunities > 0 Unverified: Everything else
Used in - Layout: Campaign Member Page Layout, Report Type: Campaigns_with_Campaign_Members_and_Other
External Systems Utilization: None
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
The current status of the related Account within the Committed business line.
Disqualified: DQ reason is not null Active Customer: # of Committed BUs > 0 Former Customer: # of Won Committed Opportunities > 0 Prospect: # of Opportunities > 0 Unverified: Everything else
CustomField.label: Account Status (Committed)
